Summary: Two hightly credible witnesses of near football-field sized, "top" shaped craft which moved from above the mountain to approx. 200 ft directly above. Silver w/ 3 bands of "chaser" lights. Silent. possible time manipulation and telepathy

divs: sighting detailsi am 22 years old and attend college at west virginia university. what i am about to explain did not happen to me, but has greatly affected my life, so i write this with absolute sincerety. the event happened to my mother and uncle, both from central west virginia. i was 14 when my mother first explained it. since then, i have had several in-depth discussions with both my mother and uncle. i can truely testify about the honesty and impact it has had on their lives. here is exactly what happened: in the spring of 1982, my mother was finishing up her masters degree in teaching and had driven to morgantown for an evening class. my uncle rode up with her and attended a mountaineer basketball game while she was in class. at roughly 8pm that evening, they began their drive home on interstate 79 south. just before you reach the i-68 turnoff, you come across a bridge approx. 200 yards long. as they approached the bridge my uncle noticed a large still object hovering above the mountain to their left, which is roughly a mile away. halfway onto the bridge at this point, my mother pulled over and both got out of the car to take a better look. after sitting on the bridge for several mintues trying to determine what this object was, my uncle realized that not one single car, going north or south, had driven by. not to mention they had passed a state trooper who had someone pulled over just a few miles back. i will get back to this, but to continue... as they stared at this object in the sky my mother thought to herself "what ever that thing is, i wish it was closer." almost instantly after that thought crossed her mind, this massive object moved directly above them, approx. 200 ft above my mothers car. it approached them in a zig-zag pattern at which seemed like light speed and was nearly the size of the entire span of the bridge. this very moment was described as the most terrifying seconds in my mothers life. she rushed back into the car, screaming for my uncle to get in. however, my uncle, completely frozen in awe, would not budge. as my mother tried getting him into the car, a sudden overwhelming feeling, one that she had never experienced before, crawled through her body and she knew, at that point, whatever was in controll of the ufo was not going to hurt them. minutes later my uncle climbed into the car and they continued to observe. the craft itself was shaped like a childs "top", or an upside down tear drop, and was completely still. it was a metalic silver color, with absolutely no sound what-so-ever. no engine, no humming, nothing. three bands of white "chaser" lights wrapped around the craft. one towards the bottom, middle, and top of the ufo. there were no signs of landing gear, doors, windows, hatches, or anything of that nature. after approx. 10-15 of observation, the craft flew off over the mountain in the same zig zag pattern and speed that it came in. immediately after it dissapeared, they finished crossing the bridge and took i-68 east (which runs behind the mountain that the craft first appeared\dissapeared)in hopes of seeing it again. however, no such luck. the ride back home was described as very silent, with little being said. both, as you can imagine, were in somewhat of a "shocked" state. they contacted the police to inquire about any reportings of ufo's. no reportings had been made. the following evening my mother told her entire night class about the incident, in which she received a great deal of negative criticism. again i would like to stress the importance of how genuine, honest, respected, and loving my mother and uncle are. they, or i, have nothing to gain from fabricating a story. what i have explained is the truth. i would be happy to get you in touch with my mother and uncle, as they would be happy to speak with you.
